text.section: To apply for a license, an applicant shall submit to the Commissioner an application on the form that the Commissioner provides.
The Commissioner may refuse an application if it contains erroneous or incomplete information.

With the application, the applicant shall pay to the Commissioner:
A license fee in the amount established under § 12-904 of this subtitle; and
A nonrefundable investigation fee in the amount established under § 12-904 of this subtitle.
With the application, the applicant shall file a surety bond with the Commissioner as provided in § 12-914 of this subtitle.
